snippet.title: Sanctum 2 - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Read more about Sanctum 2: 
http://www.facebook.com/SanctumGame

Follow the development blog: 
http://coffeestainstudios.com/blog

Sanctum 2 is the sequel to the 2011 Steam hit Sanctum, and expands on the concept of mashing Tower Defense strategy with (now even more!) intense action FPS! Sanctum 2 features 4 player co-op, deep customization and will be available on Steam, XBLA and PSN later this year!
